lmTest.name: Maxent No Feature Classes Available Model Test
lmTest.description: This is a test that configures Maxent in such a way that no feature types are available for creating the model. This happens when using auto features and setting the thresholds for feature classes to be greater than the number of points available with linear features disabled.
lmTest.jobXml: <job> <processType>110</processType> <jobId>meNoFeaturesModel</jobId> <parentUrl>http://lifemapper.org/services/sdm/experiments/687061</parentUrl>
